name: PagerDuty
description: PagerDuty turns any signal into insight and action to improve agility and visibility across organizations. Through its SaaS-based platform, PagerDuty arms developers, IT operations, support, security, and business leaders to prevent and resolve incidents for exceptional customer experiences. As revenue and brand reputation depends on customer satisfaction, more than 9,000 small, mid-size and enterprise global customers such as Comcast, Lululemon, Slack, IBM and Panasonic use and trust PagerDuty to maximize their time and increase their business response and efficiency.   PagerDuty for Android enables the following:  FLEXIBILITY OF NOTIFICATIONS Receive unlimited push notification alerts and set custom sounds for alerts.  TAKE ACTION FAST Easily access and respond to open incidents (acknowledge, resolve, or reassign). You can also create new incidents directly from the mobile app.  THE INCIDENT DETAILS YOU NEED View incident details, grouped alerts, and resolution timelines at a glance.  MANAGE ON-CALL SCHEDULES View your on-call shifts and team schedules. Book overrides for yourself or your teammates.  RECRUIT THE RIGHT PEOPLE View user directory for user on-call schedules and contact information. Easily loop in responders for additional help with a single tap.  REMEDIATE FROM MOBILE Execute custom actions (like restarting servers, running diagnostics, etc.) on incidents.  *A PagerDuty user account is required to use this application.
